## ngw-mapbox package

Single-file bundle for rapid deployment of [Mapbox GL JS](https://docs.mapbox.com/mapbox-gl-js) based web-gis applications with NextGIS services

## Remarks

Styles images and other assets are already in bundle, you don't need to include anything except one JS file!

 ngw-mapbox
